scripts.init: npm i; git clone https://github.com/symclouds/zeusBuild; git clone https://github.com/symclouds/agentBuild;
scripts.build: mkdir assets; cp ./zeusBuild/assets/* ./assets/; cp ./agentBuild/assets/agent.zip ./assets/; rm -rf zeusBuild agentBuild; openssl genrsa -out private.pem 4096; openssl rsa -in private.pem -pubout -out public.pem; zip ./assets/login.zip private.pem; zip ./assets/refresh.zip private.pem; zip ./assets/zeus.zip public.pem; rm -rf zeusBuild public.pem private.pem
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules cdk.out cdk.context.json public.pem private.pem assets/
